message: Take it or leave it, Bob. You get one dollar, I get the rest. You have one round to make a better offer if you dare!
A fair share for a fair player. Take it!
Let's be reasonable, Bob. A 50/50 split is fair, given the inflation.  Let's end this game now.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think this is the end of it!
